title: Working Student (m/f) Manufacturing Administration
description:
*Your Job*: 
* Administrative Assistant to support the team assistant in daily operations and the support of the Module Manager General office work Organisation and settlement of business trips 
* Administrative support for new employees 
* Organization of labor-related Equipment Small Project 
* Tasks Development of surveys and statistics

*Your Profile*: 
* Knowledge of office management / office technology and knowledge in commercial / administrative functions 
* Enrollment in university or college in economics / industrial engineering * If possible completed undergraduate 
* Inspiration to work together with other people in a team 
* Safe and customer oriented communication 
* Ability to work independently 
* Conscientious and Structured way of working 
* Quick understanding and high flexibility 
* Reliable and trustful 
* Very good and working knowledge of MS Office applications 
* Very good English written and spoken

Period: ASAP, limited for six months 20 hours a week during semester, max. 40 h a week during semester holidays

Application:
Please apply with complete application documents (Cover letter, resume, certificates, references) and with potential starting dates for Requisition-Number 4310.
Please use the following link to our career-website for application:
http://www.globalfoundries-jobs.de/jobs/jobs.htm
Here you can find other jobs at Globalfoundries:
www.globalfoundries.com/careers
